name: Ghosts 'n Goblins Arcade
overview: The original arcade game with all complete 8 levels was developed as fan project for the C64 by the group Nostalgia in 2015. * Two completely new levels added * Existing 4 levels are twice the size * All levels with completely new gfx * Each level has a new unique tune * Each boss fight has a new tune * New Sound Effects added or changed * New bug free sprite multiplexer * Intro sequence added * Game Map added * Game Completed Animation added * Game Over sequence added * Two new bosses added for levels 5 & 6 * New Jumping Skeleten Enemy added * Moving Clouds completely recoded * Arthur can now turn around while jumping so he can shoot backwards * Arthur can jump over obstacles when he is touching them * Weapon system improved * Enemies have improved AI and a lot of them are completely recoded * Hitting an enemy animation added * Time Limit is much better and fairer * Title Screen with Title Tune added * Pause added with Quit option * Easyflash version with High Score saver to flash and backup to disk * Universal File version that should work on any device * IFFL version with REU support * PAL and NTSC supported
